description: Ultimate Test Automation framework for Web, API, Android and iOS automation testing

features.title: Zero boilerplate code
features.description: Exposes ready to use static methods to perform various actions on web, mobile and API platforms, thus reducing the need to write any boilerplate codes.

features.title: Configurable
features.description: Highly configurable via JSON files and environment variables. It is easy to extend and customize the framework.

features.title: API Testing
features.description: Supports API testing with simple and easy to write test cases.

features.title: Web Testing
features.description: Supports Web testing with Chrome, Firefox, Edge and Safari browsers.

features.title: Cloud Support
features.description: Provides facility to run tests on Cloud platforms like BrowserStack.

features.title: Parallel execution
features.description: Allows parallel and sequential execution of tests using any testing framework.

features.title: Logging events
features.description: Provides logging support using Log4J2 to log all events occurred during test execution.

features.title: Inbuilt verification
features.description: Provides inbuilt verification for inline assertion of element properties and API responses.

features.title: Response schema verification
features.description: Provides API response schema verification for Rest APIs.
